text: Departure from Egypt. The Israelites set out from Rameses for Succoth, about six hundred thousand men on foot, not counting the children.
From Asher, fit for military service and set in battle array: forty thousand.
At the Fountain Gate they went straight up by the steps of the City of David and continued along the top of the wall above the house of David until they came to the Water Gate on the east.
The people therefore gathered together to build up the city, for part of the wall of the eastern valley had collapsed. And Jonathan repaired the quarter called Chaphenatha.
Then, raising a battle cry in his ancestral language, and with hymns, he charged Gorgias’ men when they were not expecting it and put them to flight.
By your words you will be acquitted, and by your words you will be condemned.” The Demand for a Sign.
David himself calls him ‘lord’; so how is he his son?” [The] great crowd heard this with delight. Denunciation of the Scribes.
Blessed are those servants whom the master finds vigilant on his arrival. Amen, I say to you, he will gird himself, have them recline at table, and proceed to wait on them.
Although he had performed so many signs in their presence they did not believe in him,
